Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

KSIntSurfaceSpecular.cxx
1 #include "KSIntSurfaceSpecular.h"

3 #include "KSInteractionsMessage.h"

5 #include "KRandom.h"
6 using katrin::KRandom;

8 namespace Kassiopeia
9 {
10 
11  KSIntSurfaceSpecular::KSIntSurfaceSpecular() :
12  fProbability( .0 ),
13  fReflectionLoss( 0. ),
14  fTransmissionLoss( 0. ),
15  fReflectionLossFraction( 0. ),
16  fTransmissionLossFraction( 0. ),
17  fUseRelativeLoss(false)
18  {
19  }
20  KSIntSurfaceSpecular::KSIntSurfaceSpecular( const KSIntSurfaceSpecular& aCopy ) :
21  KSComponent(),
22  fProbability( aCopy.fProbability ),
23  fReflectionLoss( aCopy.fReflectionLoss ),
24  fTransmissionLoss( aCopy.fTransmissionLoss ),
25  fReflectionLossFraction( aCopy.fReflectionLossFraction ),
26  fTransmissionLossFraction( aCopy.fTransmissionLossFraction ),
27  fUseRelativeLoss( aCopy.fUseRelativeLoss)
28  {
29  }
30  KSIntSurfaceSpecular* KSIntSurfaceSpecular::Clone() const
31  {
32  return new KSIntSurfaceSpecular( *this );
33  }
34  KSIntSurfaceSpecular::~KSIntSurfaceSpecular()
35  {
36  }
37 
38  void KSIntSurfaceSpecular::ExecuteInteraction( const KSParticle& anInitialParticle, KSParticle& aFinalParticle, KSParticleQueue& aQueue )
39  {
40  double tChoice = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform( 0., 1. );
41  if( tChoice < fProbability )
42  {
43  ExecuteTransmission( anInitialParticle, aFinalParticle, aQueue );
44  }
45  else
46  {
47  ExecuteReflection( anInitialParticle, aFinalParticle, aQueue );
48  }
49  return;
50  }
51  void KSIntSurfaceSpecular::ExecuteReflection( const KSParticle& anInitialParticle, KSParticle& aFinalParticle, KSParticleQueue& )
52  {
53  double tKineticEnergy = anInitialParticle.GetKineticEnergy();
54 
55  if(fUseRelativeLoss)
56  {
57  tKineticEnergy *= (1.0 - fReflectionLossFraction);
58  }
59  else
60  {
61  tKineticEnergy -= std::fabs(KConst::Q() * fReflectionLoss);
62  }
63 
64  //prevent kinetic energy from going negative
65  if(tKineticEnergy < 0.0)
66  {
67  intmsg( eError ) << "surface diffuse interaction named <" << GetName() << "> tried to give a particle a negative kinetic energy." << eom;
68  return;
69  }
70 
71  KThreeVector tNormal;
72  if( anInitialParticle.GetCurrentSurface() != NULL )
73  {
74  tNormal = anInitialParticle.GetCurrentSurface()->Normal( anInitialParticle.GetPosition() );
75  }
76  else if( anInitialParticle.GetCurrentSide() != NULL )
77  {
78  tNormal = anInitialParticle.GetCurrentSide()->Normal( anInitialParticle.GetPosition() );
79  }
80  else
81  {
82  intmsg( eError ) << "surface specular interaction named <" << GetName() << "> was given a particle with neither a surface nor a side set" << eom;
83  return;
84  }
85  KThreeVector tInitialMomentum = anInitialParticle.GetMomentum();
86  KThreeVector tInitialNormalMomentum = tInitialMomentum.Dot( tNormal ) * tNormal;
87  KThreeVector tInitialTangentMomentum = tInitialMomentum - tInitialNormalMomentum;
88 
89  aFinalParticle = anInitialParticle;
90  aFinalParticle.SetMomentum( tInitialTangentMomentum - tInitialNormalMomentum );
91  aFinalParticle.SetKineticEnergy( tKineticEnergy );
92 
93  return;
94  }
95  void KSIntSurfaceSpecular::ExecuteTransmission( const KSParticle& anInitialParticle, KSParticle& aFinalParticle, KSParticleQueue& )
96  {
97  double tKineticEnergy = anInitialParticle.GetKineticEnergy();
98 
99  if(fUseRelativeLoss)
100  {
101  tKineticEnergy *= (1.0 - fTransmissionLossFraction);
102  }
103  else
104  {
105  tKineticEnergy -= std::fabs(KConst::Q() * fTransmissionLoss);
106  }
107 
108  //prevent kinetic energy from going negative
109  if(tKineticEnergy < 0.0)
110  {
111  intmsg( eError ) << "surface diffuse interaction named <" << GetName() << "> tried to give a particle a negative kinetic energy." << eom;
112  return;
113  }
114 
115  aFinalParticle = anInitialParticle;
116  aFinalParticle.SetKineticEnergy( tKineticEnergy );
117 
118  return;
119  }
120 
121 }
